description: This file defines a View class for a TodoMVC application, handling DOM manipulation, rendering, and event binding for the user interface.

classes.name: View
classes.description: A class that manages the DOM interactions and rendering for the TodoMVC app.

methods.name: _removeItem
methods.description: Removes a todo item element from the DOM by its data-id.

methods.name: _clearCompletedButton
methods.description: Updates the clear completed button's text and visibility.

methods.name: _setFilter
methods.description: Sets the current filter in the UI.

methods.name: _elementComplete
methods.description: Marks a todo item as completed or not in the DOM.

methods.name: _editItem
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a todo item.

methods.name: _editItemDone
methods.description: Completes editing of a todo item and updates its label.

methods.name: _replaceContentWithHtml
methods.description: Replaces the content of an element with new HTML content.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Executes a rendering command based on the provided view command and parameters.

methods.name: _itemId
methods.description: Retrieves the data-id of a list item element.

methods.name: _bindItemEditDone
methods.description: Binds event handlers for finishing editing a todo item.

methods.name: _bindItemEditCancel
methods.description: Binds event handlers for canceling editing a todo item.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds application events to handler functions.
